name: Love Balls Pro
description:
The rule is so easy you just need to draw a line by your finger to connect the two balls so that both balls can collide, you need imagination and thought.

Once you understand the rules of this game and play it I'm sure you'll love it!

Game Features:
• Free to play. All content (all balls and levels).
• Lots of different levels!
• 40+ unique obstacles
• Complete missions and get the new balls.
• Different obstacles and experience every time
• Endless gameplay.

So Download our Love Balls Pro game and enjoy the best brainstorming game ever!

Challenge your friends for the highest score!


WHAT'S Story?

Laila(girl emoji) one of the most beautiful girl but unfortunately she lost her lover duo to luck.

You(boy emoji) have to meet with Laila to prove your love. For some devious purpose, the obstacle has dropped prices of separation. you need to leave with no choice but to draw the line. Whatever lies ahead, you must recover your love.
